name: Pissfingers
description: This is Pissfingers. She can't live in a home with children,books, or electricity.

name: Artemis
description: This is Artemis she is 6 months old and a happy girl that loves to run.

name: Tom
description: This is Tom he is just happy.

name: Brodie
description: This is Brodie, he is a party animal.

name: Athena
description: This is Athena, she is shy but loves with all her heart.

name: The Brain
description: This is The Brain, he used to be a mouse but used science to become a cat as part of his plan to take over the world.

name: Pinkey
description: This is Pinkey, he used to be a mouse but The Brian made him into a cat to assist him with taking over the world.

name: Yacko
description: This is Yacko, we found him at the water tower with Wacko and Dot, they are zaney to the max.

name: Wacko
description: This is Wacko, we found him at the water tower with Yacko and Dot, they are zaney to the max.

name: Dot
description: This is Dot, we found her at the water tower with Yacko and Wacko, they are zaney to the max.

name: Popcorn
description: This is Popcorn,she is very smart and loving.

name: Gandalf
description: This is Gandalf,he is very intelegent and loyal.

name: Neil
description: This is Neil,he loves to play fectch, he always has his balls just in case.

name: Ripley
description: This is Ripley,she is a very happy girl and full of love.

name: Betty
description: This is Betty,she is the best mother dog I have ever seen.

name: Bandit
description: This is Bandit, he is one of Betty's babies and he will steal your heart.

name: Appa
description: This is Appa, he is one of Betty's babies and he will fly away with you at any time.

name: Sally
description: This is Sally, she is one of Betty's babies and she is full of very smart and ready to learn.

name: Neil
description: This is Neil, he is one of Betty's babies and he will drum out time for you with his tail.

name: Max
description: This is Max, he is a angel in heaven looking down on me now.
